FuncDef:
The display control-flap command displays the running status and statistics of control-flap on an interface. You can adjust parameters about control-flap based on the statistics.
If no interface is specified, the running status and statistics of control-flap on all interfaces are displayed. The display control-flap command displays the running status and statistics of control-flap on an interface. You can adjust parameters about control-flap based on the statistics. If no interface is specified, the running status and statistics of control-flap on all interfaces are displayed.

ParaDef.Info:
Interface type.
The value is of the enumerated type.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: Before you monitor interface status or locate an interface fault, run the display control-flap command to view the running status and statistics of control-flap on the interface. The command output helps you adjust control-flap parameters, collect traffic statistics, and troubleshoot the interface.
